humanitarian_and_compassionate_factors: Limited evidence on the applicant's situation in Kenya
No explanation of how best interests of the child warranted an exemption
procedural_fairness: No legal requirement existed for an interview
decision_outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed; no question certified
misrepresentation_or_fraud: Non-disclosure of the applicant as a dependent when the mother applied for Canadian permanent residence
legal_basis: Under IRPA and Regulations, failure to disclose a non-accompanying dependent bars family sponsorship unless H&C grounds justify an exemption
